name: Mugen Nurikabe
description:
Description

A simple implementation of Nurikabe, a puzzle made by Nikoli.

Controls

Left Click: Mark black cell

Middle Click: Pan screen

Scroll Up/Down: Zoom in/out

Known Bugs

None that I am aware of. If you find a bug, please report it in the comment section or on my Discord Server.

Planned Features
  • Not really a feature, but improving the appearance of the UI (buttons, dialogs, etc.).

If you have a suggestion for the game, let me know in the comment section or on my Discord Server.

Notes

The game should always generate a puzzle that has at least one solution. If you find a puzzle with no solution, feel free to send me a save file of your game on my Discord Server.

Discord

https://discord.gg/s6bB5G6
